title: # 525 - Jelly Roll & ME
itunes:title: # 525 - Jelly Roll & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with musician, Jelly Roll. We talk about doing time at 15, songwriting, the fully loaded tour, playing Kimmel the night before, partying, and much more! 

 

Follow Jelly

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jellyroll615 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JellyRoll615 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Lucy. Go to http://www.lucy.co and use the promo code “Bert” at checkout.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Wine Enthusiast. Go to http://www.wineenthusiast.com or text “BERT” to 511511 for the 4th of July Wine Cellar & Furniture sale.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Dad Grass. Get 20% off your first order at http://www.dadgrass.com/bert 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
